Elimination of equality from antecedent after substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  Reduce dependencies on axioms.  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 28-Jul-2018.)

 Elimination of equality from antecedent after substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof revised by Jim Kingdon, 20-Jan-2018.)
statement: sbequ8 $p |- ( [ y / x ] ph <-> [ y / x ] ( x = y -> ph ) ) $.
